这是什么？这是一款能储存你经验♂的插件！


我知道该插件似乎已经烂大街了！
但是我感觉这个插件似乎还是很简单的！
原文内容{恩=-=我英语很不好，所以我按自己的话说咯~}
ExperienceWithdraw  ExperienceWithdraw is a plugin where users can withdraw their exp and put it into an Xp Bottle, and throw it down to add it back(similar to CosmicPVP).  Usage  Commands  /xpwithdraw  - Withdraws the amount of xp specified by user.( is in experience points, not experience levels) /xpamount - Tells you how much experience points you have. /xpamount - Tells you how much experience points the specified user has.(Defaults to OPs) Permissions  experiencewithdraw.withdraw(Defaults to everyone in v1.2) experiencewithdraw.amount(Defaults to everyone in v1.2) experiencewithdraw.amount.others(Defaults to OPs) To Do List  Add a config file to toggle aliases for /xpwithdraw Add a lore on withdrawn xp bottles to specify the player who withdrew it. *Done!(v1.1) Make in-game stuff prettier. Implement a command that tells you how much experience points you have. *Done!(v1.2) Make /xpwithdraw and /xpamount default to all users and /xpamount [username] default to OPs. *Done!(v1.2) Known Bugs  Normal Experience Bottles doesn't work. NOTE: ExperienceWithdraw V1.1 and above uses PluginMetrics to further track plugin's downloads/usages, if you want to opt out, simply toggle it in the PluginMetrics config file in the PluginMetrics folder



插件功能
  众所周知！它嘛，就是储存经验♂的，将你的经验放在一个瓶子。
怎么用？砸向地面！
插件指令
就三个，是不是很简单？
  当然了！就三个呗！
/ xpwithdraw <量>—将你身上的经验♂放入瓶子 (<量>是经验值,而不是经验等级！)/ xpamount -告诉你，你瓶子里有多少经验值。/ xpamount <玩家名字> -告诉你，某个用户有多少经验值（在瓶子里的）。 (默认为OP)

插件权限
也三个，是不是很简单？
  experiencewithdraw 储存经验♂的权限(默认所有用户都可以！)experiencewithdraw 查询自己的经验数量（默认所有用户都可以！）experiencewithdraw.amount 查看别的玩家的经验数量(默认为OP！)
已知Bug
原文：Normal Experience Bottles doesn't work.
译文：普通的经验瓶子不能储存？
安装方法：丢到Plugins里然后重启服务器即可。
